title: Mastering D3v5
text: An online course I created covering D3v5, interactive mapping, linked visualizations, 3rd party api integration & more.

title: Pizza-Deliver Node API
text: An API using core Node API, no npm: user-accounts (CRUD), a cli, auth, menu & cart management, stripe & mailgun api integration, logging & more.

title: SayWhat?!
text: Look at patterns in the text of presidential inaugural addresses in this data-viz focused, full-stack, mobile-first responsive project.

title: World Bank Mapped Categories
text: Zoom, toggle, and hover in this map of the countries of the world categorically colored by their GNI per capita.

title: R.I Stats
hoverText: Review Poverty & Income levels in Rhode Island through simple charts & maps.

title: CT Housing Permits, Mapped
text: An interactive choropleth mapping project, representing the range of housing permits issued per town in Connecticut in 2018.

title: Enterprise Resource Planner
text: A time-tracking, ticket-based, resource management system. I do not own the code for this project.

title: Macro Recipes
text: Find Recipes based on ingredients and amounts of carbs, calories, fat, and protein.
